content: Users which you selected in the previous step will be imported into groups created in {{serviceName}}. Groups will appear in the {{contactsName}} section.

comment.text: The translation key "GroupsDescription" is used to describe the action of importing selected users into groups created in a service. This text appears in a data import component and helps users understand how their selections will be used.

usage.context:
<ImportSection
 isChecked={importOptions.importGroups}
 onChange={(e) => onChange(e, "importGroups")}
 sectionName={t("Common:Groups")}
 description={t("Settings:GroupsDescription", {
 serviceName,
 contactsName: t("Common:Contacts"),
 })}
 exportSection={{
 sectionName: t("Common:Groups"),

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'imported' is translated as 'входирани', which is not the most accurate or natural translation in this context. A better translation would be something along the lines of 'вносени' (imported) or 'добавени' (added).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Потребителите, които сте избрали в предишната стъпка, ще бъдат вносени/добавени в групи, създадени в {{serviceName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "huoneisiin" (rooms) is used instead of "ryhmiin" (groups). The English text clearly refers to groups, not rooms.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Käyttäjät, jotka valitsit edellisessä vaiheessa tuodaan ryhmiin, jotka on luotu {{serviceName}}ssa. Ryhmät ilmestyvät {{contactsName}}-osioon.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "qu'on a créé" is awkward and less formal than a more suitable phrasing. It translates literally to 'that we created' but doesn't flow naturally in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Les groupes qui ont été créés dans {{serviceName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrasing "Les utilisateurs... seront importés vers" could be improved for a more natural flow. 'Vers' implies direction, which isn't quite accurate here. The users are being imported *into* the groups.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Les utilisateurs... seront importés dans les groupes...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Նախորդ քայլում ձեր ընտրած օգտատերերը" could be improved for clarity and flow. A more natural phrasing might be "Ձեր նախորդ քայլում ընտրած օգտատերերը" or similar.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ձեր նախորդ քայլում ընտրած օգտատերերը կներմուծվեն...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "կներմուծվեն" (will be imported) might sound slightly formal or less natural in this context. A more conversational alternative might be considered.
Consistency in the use of quotes is important. Ensure that quotes used within the translated text match the style used elsewhere in the application or guidelines.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review and standardize the quotation mark style throughout the application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පෙරvious' appears to be a misspelling. It should likely be 'පෙරහුදු' or 'පෙර'.
The sentence structure 'පෙරහුදු පියවරේදී ඔබ තෝරාගත් පරිශීලකයින්' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing might be 'ඔබ පෙරහුදු පියවරේදී තෝරාගත් පරිශීලකයින්'.
The word 'සාදන ලද' (saadana lac) is a bit literal and clunky in this context. A more natural equivalent for 'created' might be 'ඇති'.
The word 'odabrali' might be better as 'izabrali'. While 'odabrali' is grammatically correct, 'izabrali' is more commonly used in this context.
The Ukrainian translation uses double quotes (») instead of single quotes (') for the section name. The English uses single quotes, and consistency is generally preferred.
The phrase 'will be imported into' is overly literal. A more natural Chinese phrasing would be '会加入' (hui jia ru) or '会被添加到' (hui bei tian jia dao) which means 'will be added to'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您在前一步选择的用户会被添加到在{{serviceName}}中创建的群组。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'will appear' is a literal translation of 'will appear' and '显示' (xian shi) is correct, but a more natural phrasing would be '会出现在' (hui chuo xian) or '可以在' (ke yi zai) which means 'can be found in' or 'will be visible in'.
